title: New River Gorge National River: Arts in the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Arts in the Park               Arts in the Park        Bluets, by Jenna Gale, winner of 2013 Youth Arts in the Parks Wildflower Art Contest           Youth Arts in the Parks Celebrate ecology through art! Check out the Youth Arts in the Parks page to learn about our annual Youth Arts in the Parks Wildflower Art Contest and other exciting youth arts events. more…             Hidden History Photo Contest Celebrate the riches of southern West Virginia’s cultural history through photography. Learn more about the Hidden History Photo Contest, an annual photography contest that is a part of our Hidden History Weekend. more…         Meet our Artist in Residence We are excited to have park volunteer “Resident Artist” Cecil Glenn Runions, in the park doing Plein Air (outside painting with natural light) painting in watercolor and acrylic. Cecil has studied art at Concord University and teaches art classes for the Beckley Art Group and Morgantown Art Association. He will be out in the park most weekends. If you run into him, he will be happy to talk with you about painting.
